name: validate_user_by_cpr
description: Validate and retrieve user details by CPR (Civil Personal Record) number. Returns complete user profile including personal information, address, occupation, and income. Use this to verify user identity before processing transactions.

name: get_monthly_transaction_summary
description: Get aggregated monthly transaction summary for a specific CPR. Returns total credits, debits, net amount, transaction counts, category breakdown, and status breakdown. Use this when user asks for monthly summary, overview, or statistics.

month.description: Month number (1-12). Defaults to current month if not specified

year.description: Year (YYYY format, e.g., 2025). Defaults to current year if not specified

name: get_monthly_transactions_detailed
description: Get detailed list of all transactions for a CPR in a specific month. Returns individual transaction records with full details including transaction ID, date, description, type, amount, category, status, and payment source. Supports filtering by transaction type (Credit/Debit) and category.

month.description: Month number (1-12). Defaults to current month

type.description: Optional filter by transaction type: 'Credit' for incoming money, 'Debit' for outgoing money

category.description: Optional filter by category (e.g., Salary, Shopping, Utilities, Dining, Transport, Entertainment, Health, Housing, Groceries, Transfer)

name: get_all_transactions_by_cpr
description: Get all transactions for a specific CPR across all time periods with pagination support. Returns complete transaction history sorted by date (newest first) with summary statistics. Use this when user asks for complete transaction history, all transactions, or transaction list with pagination.

limit.description: Number of records to return per page (default: 100, max: 100)

offset.description: Number of records to skip for pagination (default: 0). Use offset=0 for first page, offset=100 for second page, etc.
